This command grabs the code from the repo...
>> git clone git@github.com:aritra90/DIMminer.git GitHubStuff/

Make changes to files......

This command lists the changes made...
>> git diff 

This command lists the modified files...
>> git status

This command adds the changes to commit...
>> git add -A

Then commit...
>> git commit -m "These are the changes I made..."

Pull any changes made since last time we got something...
>> git pull origin master 

Push our changes...
>> git push origin master
